objects.text:
Premium Faux Leather Construction
Spacious Interior with Zipper Closure
Gold-Tone Hardware & Accents
Perfect Size for Everyday Use

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner design showcases a stylish luxury-themed composition for a fashion product, structured with a visually engaging layout and soft-toned elegance. Dominated by a rectangular accent frame and subtle background shapes, the design provides a refined feel. The "heading" text layer sits boldly at the top, drawing attention with a dark serif font. Beneath it, the "subheading" highlights the brand and product name in a lighter tone, followed by the "description" layer listing features in a clean sans-serif font. The "price" text layer is prominently placed in the lower left, near the "cta_button" and "cta" call-to-action. A high-quality "product_image" balances the layout on the right. 

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White: `#F5EFE6`
- Accent Beige: `#D9B38C`
- Warm Brown: `#8B5A2B`
- Soft Tan: `#A67C52`
- Rich Mocha Text: `#5E4A3B`
- White (CTA Text): `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated ALDO handbag in a warm camel brown base color (#B97A56), highlighted with gold-toned metallic accents (#D4AF37) on the hardware and decorative chains. The main color is smooth and matte with a subtle crosshatch texture, giving the bag a premium look. The gold elements contrast vibrantly with the matte brown, serving as visual focal points without overpowering the design, blending elegance and modernity. For an advertisement banner, a soft beige (#F5E9DC) or off-white (#FAF6F2) background can complement the brown while making the gold details pop. Accents of soft blush (#EEC9B7) may add a touch of femininity.
